title: Me vs Me
text: I finally feel confident in my own skin and in who I am becoming. Growing up that wasn't always the case so I'm thankful for the people that have enouraged me along the way.

title: My Hope
text: Why choose joy in the midst of all the trials, pains, and struggles in this world? That is because one day there will be no more. We GET to be a light, reminding and enouraging everybody to endure. Struggles are short-lived but joy will be forever.

title: My Strength
text: I found my strength by letting go of my weaknesses. Instead being ruled by insecurities I choose to focus on my strengths and bring out the strengths of those around me.
